messages.title: Strong and Stable Future for Stroud Valleys & Vale
messages.content: Neil Carmichael believes a strong and stable economy is the best way to secure a prosperous future for the Stroud Valleys and Vale.

messages.title: Championing Our Children's Mental Health
messages.content: Neil Carmichael welcomed the Prime Minister's initiative in addressing children's mental health issues.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Believes in creating a strong and stable economy to benefit the local area.
Supports initiatives for addressing children's mental health.
Improving roads, supporting the reopening of the Stroudwater Canal, and promoting green open spaces.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit will not damage our universities but will push them to be world-leading.
issues.economy: Without a growing economy, we can’t generate the tax revenues to properly fund our public services.
issues.education: Pledged to campaign for fairer funding for local schools.
issues.environment: Promote green open spaces and support local wildlife.
issues.health: Welcomed the Prime Minister's initiative on children’s mental health.
issues.transport: Improving local roads and reopening the Stroudwater Canal.

community.content: Supporting the reopening of the Stroudwater Canal. Promoting green open spaces.

images.caption: Caring for the elderly, Protecting our natural environment and wildlife, Improving our roads in Valleys & Vale, Supporting reopening of the Stroudwater Canal.

examples: Over £2bn has been directly allocated to mental health services since 2014.
Neil has been incredibly supportive in helping to raise the profile of neurodiversity in our schools.
Fair funding fits our rural disadvantages.
